Classes in org.openexchangerates.client used by org.openexchangerates.client
RestClient.ConnectionInitializer
          Implementors can configure the http connection before every call is made.
RestClient.ConnectionProvider
          implement to provide an HttpURLConnection w/ some properties pre-set see BasicAuthenticationConnectionProvider for an example.
RestClient.ErrorHandler
          The ErrorHander does something based on an HTTP or I/O error.
RestClient.HttpGETCache
          A caching interface clients may set to enable caching of GETs.
RestClient.HttpGETCacheEntry
          Represents all information that should be cached by HttpGETCache implementation.
RestClient.HttpMethod
          HTTP methods supported by REST client.
RestClient.Response
          The response from the server for a given request.
RestClient.ResponseDeserializer
           
RestClient.URLBuilder
          Utility interface for building URLs from String segments.
